送信側ＴＳ利用者: (そうしんがわティーエスりようしゃ) - sending TS user
送信元: (そうしんもと) - sender; source (of a transmission, e.g. email)
送信所: (そうしんじょ) - transmitting station, e.g. for TV
送信要求: (そうしんようきゅう) - Request-To-Send; RTS
送受: (そうじゅ) - sending and receiving/transception; to transceive/to send and receive
送受信: (そうじゅしん) - transceiver (send and receive)
送呈: (そうてい) - sending a book as a present
送客: (そうきゃく) - sending off a customer (e.g. to the closest train station); sending customers (somebody's way)
送料: (そうりょう) - postage; carriage; shipping charge
送料別: (そうりょうべつ) - postage not included; postage excluded
送検: (そうけん) - sending the person accused to the prosecutor
送水口: (そうすいこう) - water supply pipe inlet-outlet (esp. on standpipes and dry risers)
送水管: (そうすいかん) - water pipe; water main
送籍: (そうせき) - transfer of legal domicile
送葬: (そうそう) - funeral/burial rites; attendance at a funeral
送迎: (そうげい) - seeing off and meeting on return
送迎デッキ: (そうげいデッキ) - observation deck (e.g. at an airport)
送迎会: (そうげいかい) - welcome and sending off party
送迎車: (そうげいしゃ) - courtesy car (e.g. at a hotel)
送達: (そうたつ) - delivery/dispatch/despatch/conveyance; service of process
送還: (そうかん) - sending home; repatriation; deportation
送配: (そうはい) - distribution (e.g. power, water, etc.)
送金受取人: (そうきんうけとりにん) - remittee
送金小切手: (そうきんこぎって) - cashier's cheque; cashier's check; demand draft; demand draught
送金額: (そうきんがく) - amount of remittance
送電網: (そうでんもう) - electricity supply network; transmission network; power grid
送風口: (そうふうこう) - ventilation duct; vent
逃がした魚は大きい: (にがしたさかなはおおきい) - (proverb) the biggest fish is always the one that got away
逃がし弁: (にがしべん) - escape valve; release valve; relief valve
逃がす: (にがす) - to miss; to lose; to give away; to let go; to set free; to let get away
逃げうせる: (にげうせる) - to escape; to run away
逃げだす: (にげだす) - to run away/to flee/to make off/to take to one's heels/to escape; to start to run away
逃げのびる: (にげのびる) - to make good one's escape; to escape to a safe place; to make one's getaway; to effect one's escape
逃げまどう: (にげまどう) - to run about trying to escape
逃げみぞ: (にげみぞ) - clearance groove; under cut
逃げるが勝ち: (にげるがかち) - He that fights and runs away may live to fight another day
逃げを打つ: (にげをうつ) - to (prepare to) run away (from one's responsibilities, etc.)
逃げ出す: (にげだす) - to run away/to flee/to make off/to take to one's heels/to escape; to start to run away
逃げ切る: (にげきる) - to get away; to manage to hold on
逃げ去る: (にげさる) - to take flight; to disappear
逃げ口上: (にげこうじょう) - evasive answer; excuse
逃げ回る: (にげまわる) - to run from place to place
逃げ失せる: (にげうせる) - to escape; to run away
逃げ帰る: (にげかえる) - to scurry home; to run home; to fly back
逃げ延びる: (にげのびる) - to make good one's escape; to escape to a safe place; to make one's getaway; to effect one's escape
逃げ後れる: (にげおくれる) - to fail to escape
逃げ惑う: (にげまどう) - to run about trying to escape
逃げ溝: (にげみぞ) - clearance groove; under cut
逃げ腰: (にげごし) - preparing to flee; being ready to run away
逃げ走る: (にげはしる) - to flee; to run away
逃げ足: (にげあし) - running away; escaping on foot
逃げ路: (にげみち) - way out; means to escape; escape route
逃げ込む: (にげこむ) - to take refuge in; to succeed in running away
逃げ道: (にげみち) - way out; means to escape; escape route
逃げ隠れる: (にげかくれる) - to run away and hide
逃す: (のがす) - to miss/to lose/to give away/to let go/to set free/to let get away; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to fail to ...
逃れ出る: (のがれでる) - to scuttle off; to take flight
逃亡: (とうぼう) - escape; flight; running away; elopement; fleeing
逃亡中: (とうぼうちゅう) - at large; fugitive
逃亡犯: (とうぼうはん) - fugitive from justice; fugitive criminal
